properties.Name: EmissionWasteType
properties.Description:
The type of emission waste:

Ex:
- cardboard
- food waste
- waste water
- solid waste
- third-party disposal waste

Emissions from waste depend on the type of waste being disposed of, and the waste diversion method. 

Companies should collect:

- Waste type-specific and waste treatment-specific emission factors. The emission factors should include end-of-life processes only. Emission factors may include emissions from transportation of waste.

Columns.Name: EmissionWasteTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a waste type.

Columns.Name: EmissionWasteTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a waste type.

Columns.Name: EmissionWasteTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a waste type.

Columns.Name: EmissionWasteTypeEmissionFactorUnits
Columns.Description: The number of water type emission factor units.

Columns.Name: EmissionWasteTypeEmissionFactorUomId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier associated with the waste type emission factor unit of measure.

Properties.Description:
The type of emission waste:

Ex:
- cardboard
- food waste
- waste water
- solid waste
- third-party disposal waste

Emissions from waste depend on the type of waste being disposed of, and the waste diversion method. 

Companies should collect:

- Waste type-specific and waste treatment-specific emission factors. The emission factors should include end-of-life processes only. Emission factors may include emissions from transportation of waste.
